alert.note: Alert for Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster (Nebraska) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS Hastings (North Central Kansas and South Central Nebraska)
info.headline: Severe Weather Statement issued July 04 at 7:38PM CDT until July 04 at 10:00PM CDT by NWS Hastings
info.description: ...A SEVERE THUNDERSTORM WARNING REMAINS IN EFFECT UNTIL 800 PM CDT FOR SOUTHWESTERN CLAY...NORTHWESTERN NUCKOLLS...NORTHEASTERN FRANKLIN...NORTHERN WEBSTER...ADAMS AND SOUTHERN KEARNEY COUNTIES... At 738 PM CDT, severe thunderstorms were located along a line extending from 7 miles southwest of Upland to near Ayr to near Deweese, moving northeast at 30 mph. HAZARD...60 mph wind gusts and quarter size hail. SOURCE...Trained weather spotters. IMPACT...Hail damage to vehicles is expected. Expect wind damage to roofs, siding, and trees. Locations impacted include... Hastings, Minden, Blue Hill, Clay Center, Axtell, Fairfield, Hildreth, Campbell, Glenvil, Lawrence, Bladen, Roseland, Holstein, Upland, Ayr, Deweese, Norman and Rosemont. HAIL THREAT...RADAR INDICATED MAX HAIL SIZE...1.00 IN WIND THREAT...OBSERVED MAX WIND GUST...60 MPH
info.instruction: For your protection move to an interior room on the lowest floor of a building. To report severe weather contact your nearest law enforcement agency. They will send your report to the National Weather Service office in Hastings. Torrential rainfall is occurring with these storms, and may lead to flash flooding. Do not drive your vehicle through flooded roadways.

area.areaDesc: Adams; Clay; Franklin; Kearney; Nuckolls; Webster
